Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiration Disorders/Apnea/Sleep Apnea Syndromes
Nervous System Diseases/Sleep Disorders/Dyssomnias/Sleep Disorders, Intrinsic/Sleep Apnea Syndromes
Record.Synonym: Mixed Central and Obstructive Sleep Apnea
Record.Description: Disorders characterized by multiple cessations of respirations during sleep that induce partial arousals and interfere with the maintenance of sleep. Sleep apnea syndromes are divided into central (see SLEEP APNEA, CENTRAL), obstructive (see SLEEP APNEA, OBSTRUCTIVE), and mixed central-obstructive types.
